nodes.text: Jax Stog was a male Human residing on Ord Mantell around 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Jax Stog appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Ord Mantell. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
